title: How to Make Sarson Ka Saag in Jat Punjabi Style

steps.headline: Wash the mustard, spinach, and fat hen leaves under running water.
Add them in a pressure cooker and boil.
Remove the lid and check the level of the water present in it.
Check the water content.
steps.description: If the water is still present, continue to boil the leaves.

steps.headline: Add chopped green chilies, garlic and ginger.
steps.description: Close the lid of the pressure cooker and boil it again.

steps.headline: Add salt and boil(after removing the lid).
Add ghee in a frying pan.
Add cumin seeds and sauté them.
Add asafoetida powder and nix well.
Add chopped onions and mix well.
Add boiled leaves and mix well.
Serve it with rice or roti.

text: Wash the mustard, spinach, and fat hen leaves under running water.  Add them in a pressure cooker and boil.  Remove the lid and check the level of the water present in it.  Boil the leaves once again.  Check the water content. If the water is still present, continue to boil the leaves. Add chopped green chilies, garlic and ginger. Close the lid of the pressure cooker and boil it again. Add salt and boil(after removing the lid).  Add ghee in a frying pan.  Add cumin seeds and sauté them.  Add asafoetida powder and nix well.  Add chopped onions and mix well.  Add boiled leaves and mix well.  Serve it with rice or roti.
